title: Ghost Recon (PC-2001) Including MP1&MP2
description:
Tom Clancy&#039;s Ghost recon PC-game (2001)
This release contains:
GRecon.iso (Ghost recon gam/install disc)
Desert Siege.iso (Expantion pack 1 (MP1))
Island Thunder.iso (Expantion pack 2 (MP2))

Patches located in ..:\nocd1.4 crack & ptaches (on the Grecon.iso )

This game is awsome.. 
The miminum specification for Ghost Recon is as follows -


CPU - Pentium II 450 MHz processor or equivalent
Memory - 128 MB of RAM
Operating System - Windows 9X/ME/2000/XP
DirectX - DirectX 8.0 or higher (included on CD)
Video Card - 16MB DirectX 8.0 compatible 3D card
Drive Space - 1GB minimum hard drive space
CD-ROM - 4X or better
Sound Card - DirecX 8.0 compatible sound card
Internet/Network - TCP/IP connection at 28.8 KBPS or faster

So almost any Computer out there is able to run this game ;)

Let&#039;s get online and frag some in this team based soldier sim. that started the era of "Ghost Recon"

Meet me online as Sarge_of_Sweden and we will have som fun online warfare
